text: The Organization is a British television drama series, produced by Yorkshire Television for the ITV network in 1972. The series, written by Philip Mackie, was set in the offices of the fictional Greatrick Organization, a faceless multi-million pound corporation dedicated solely to profits and more profits. Peter Egan starred as new junior executive Richard Pershore, struggling to navigate his way through the corporate minefield, surrounded by more experienced and ambitious players. Through the course of seven episodes, The Organization features all the senior management team at Greatrick. ==Cast== * Peter Egan as Richard Pershore * Anton Rodgers as Peter Frame * Donald Sinden as David Pulman * Bernard Hepton as Rodney Spurling * Elaine Taylor as Veronica * Jill Melford as Eve Manship * Norman Bird as Ken Grist ==Episodes== All seven episodes were written by Philip Mackie. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |-style="color:black" ! style="background: #ACE5EE;"|# ! style="background: #ACE5EE;"|Title ! style="background: #ACE5EE;"|Director ! style="background: #ACE5EE;"|Original airdate |} ==Home media== The Organization is available on DVD in the UK. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1970s British drama television series Category:ITV television dramas Category:1972 British television series debuts Category:1972 British television series endings Category:Television series by Yorkshire Television Category:English-language television shows
